taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a project with imported applications.

step.cmd: On the Package Explorer view pane, right-click on the folder in which you want to create your enquiry.

step.stepresult: The Select a Wizard dialogue box is displayed.

step.cmd: Select New Enquiry and click on Next .
step.stepresult: The Create New Enquiry dialogue box is displayed.

step.cmd: Enter an enquiry name. This is the model's name in Design Studio and becomes the enquiry name in T24 when deployed.
step.info: This name cannot exceed 50 characters and cannot be changed once the enquiry is created.

step.cmd: Click on Browse button for selecting the application on which the enquiry will be based.
You can type a header for your enquiry. This becomes the enquiry title when running on T24.
step.info: This string size is limited to 42 characters.

step.stepresult: The Add fields to enquiry dialogue box is displayed.

step.cmd: Add fields you want in the enquiry output.

taskbody.result: The resulting enquiry is created and opened in the editor.
